item.title: Ex-astronaut charged with murder in car wreck that killed 2
item.description:
Ex-astronaut charged with murder in car wreck that killed 2

By JAY REEVES and PHILLIP LUCASAssociated Press BIRMINGHAM, Ala. (AP) - Astronaut James Halsell Jr. seemed the very definition of someone with the right stuff. An Air Force Academy graduate and decorated test pilot, he commanded or piloted five space shuttle missions.

item.title: New York Accident Lawyer Adnan Munawar Weighs-in on Train Accident in Germany Making International Headlines
item.description:
New York Accident Lawyer Adnan Munawar Weighs-in on Train Accident in Germany Making International Headlines

"A major reason why people everywhere should pay attention to this case is so that they are aware of the dangers that cell phone distraction can bring," said Adnan Munawar , Partner at Munawar & Andrews-Santillo LLP.
